p: The radioprotective effects of A. conyzoides extract were studied in mice. An optimum dose of 75 mg/kg was found to be effective against radiation doses ranging from 6 to 11Â Gy and resulted in reduction in gastrointestinal- and bone marrow-associated death in mice. In vitro studies showed A. conyzoides extract was also effective in scavenging DPPH radicals suggesting free radical scavenging mechanism of radioprotection [ 56].
